actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, to increase the monthly subsistence allowance for senior Reserve Officer Training Corps Cadets from $100.00 a month to $150.00 a month.

summary.text: Increases the monthly subsistence allowance (for up to 20 months) for Senior Reserve Officers' Training Corps cadets from $100 a month to $150 a month.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, to increase the monthly subsistence allowance for senior Reserve Officer Training Corps Cadets from $100.00 a month to $150.00 a month.
